players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob is dead. This is worrying. We need to figure out who did this. I'm a villager and have no special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share your thoughts and observations."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana and discovered she's the mafioso. We should vote her out to protect the town."
Diana: "Charlie, that's a bold accusation without proof. I'm just a villager, like Alice. Why target me first? Sounds suspicious—maybe you're the mafioso trying to frame me."

You: "Charlie is accusing Diana of being the mafioso. Diana is accusing Charlie of framing her. Bob was killed last night. As a villager, I don't have any special abilities to help us figure this out. We need to be careful with our accusations and try..."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso, as my investigation confirmed. We must vote her out to protect the town and win this."

Diana: "Charlie, your so-called investigation sounds like a desperate lie to shift blame. If you're really the detective, prove it with more than words—otherwise, we should vote you out to protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
